## webHidPairing() function

Triggers WebHID consent dialogue in compatible browsers

For an example of how to use this, see the 'Using WebHid' chapter in the 'Initializing the Jabra library' section of the JavaScript Developer's Guide.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function webHidPairing(): Promise<IWebHidDevice[]>;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;[IWebHidDevice](./jabra-js.iwebhiddevice.md)<!-- -->\[\]&gt;

- A list of allowed devices. The API will return an empty list if the user presses cancel.
